price: İkiniz Firavun’a gidin ve deyin ki: "Gerçekten biz âlemlerin Rabbinin rasulleriyiz."
arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fatiyā fir'ʿawna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbi al-ʿālamīna
